dict.acceptation: 学生，大学生；研究者，学者；中学生；<美俚>初学者；

sent.orig: Working experience in College Student Union, Student Press, or Student Radio as journalist is a must.
sent.trans: 具有学生会或校报或校广播站工作经历。

sent.orig: There is significant difference between male and student, the student is superior to student.
sent.trans: 男、女生在运动记忆策略上存在显著性差异，且男生的发展水平高于女生。

sent.orig: If we place a student in a class then another student cannot take their position.
sent.trans: 我们的每节课不超过12个人，如果学生满了，其它学员就不能参与。

sent.orig: When every student thinks every other student is working harder and doing better.
sent.trans: 当每个学生都认为其他的学生都比自己用功而且成绩更好时。

sent.orig: Each boy-student and each girl-student in this class is extremely fond of reciting poetry.
sent.trans: 这个班的每个男生、每个女生都特别善于背诗。
